sentences.english: Anyone who dared to voice different opinions would be executed or exiled.

sentences.english: In China, many criminals are executed for far less.

sentences.english: And the two leaders were later sentenced to death.

sentences.english: Many people believe that capital punishment deters crime.

definition: an execution/to put sb to death
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
to behead sb and display the head in public
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
